com.viaoa.hub
Class HubDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubDelegate

public class HubDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

Main delegate used for working with the Active Object for a Hub. All methods that have an "_" prefix should not be called directly, as there is a calling method that should be used, that performs additional functionality. If a method does not have the "_" prefix and is accessible, then it is ok to call it, but will most likely have a matching method name in the Hub class.

Author:
vincevia

verifyUniqueProperty

public static boolean verifyUniqueProperty(Hub thisHub,
                                           java.lang.Object object)
Verifies that the property in obj is unique for all objects in this Hub (not in all of system).
Note: if OAObject and isLoading, then true is always returned.
Note: if property value is a null or a blank String, then it is not checked.

setObjectClass

public static void setObjectClass(Hub thisHub,
                                  java.lang.Class objClass)
Set the Class of objects that this Hub will contain.

Note: you can not reset the Object class if there are any objects in it.

Parameters:
objClass - Class for the object being stored

isValid

public static boolean isValid(Hub hub)
If this hub has a master Hub or link Hub and that Hub does not have an active Object set, then this Hub is invalid.

See Also:
#setLinkHub, #getDetailHub, to get the Hub that this hub depends on.

getControllingHub

public static Hub getControllingHub(Hub hub)
created 20110904 Find the hub that controls whether or not this hub is valid. So that it can also be listened to, so that hub isValid can be recalculated

Returns:
controlling hub, or param hub if there is no controlling hub

setAutoSequence

public static void setAutoSequence(Hub thisHub,
                                   java.lang.String property,
                                   int startNumber,
                                   boolean bKeepSeq)
Used to update a property in each object to equal/store the position within this Hub.

Parameters:
property - is neme of property to update.
startNumber - is number to begin numbering at. Default is 0, which will match the Hub position.
bKeepSeq, - if false then seq numbers are not updated when an object is removed

setAutoMatch

public static void setAutoMatch(Hub thisHub,
                                java.lang.String property,
                                Hub hubMaster)
Makes sure that for each object in a hubMaster, there exists an object in this hub where property is equal to the hubMaster object.

Parameters:
hubMaster - hub with list of object
property - Property in this hubs objects that match object type in hubMaster
